titles.title: Providing Benefits Information in Spanish and Tagalog for Veterans and Families Act
Providing Benefits Information in Spanish and Tagalog for Veterans and Families Act
Providing Benefits Information in Spanish and Tagalog for Veterans and Families Act
Providing Benefits Information in Spanish and Tagalog for Veterans and Families Act
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make all fact sheets of the Department of Veterans Affairs in English and Spanish.
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make all fact sheets of the Department of Veterans Affairs in English, Spanish, and Tagalog.
Providing Benefits Information in Spanish and Tagalog for Veterans and Families Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 116-158.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 118.

action.text: Mr. Takano moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2943.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
